creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

-On the salver, the body of the bow and the cover are engraved the coronet and cipher of the earl of Ancaster.
markings:
Mark

-Fully marked (Britannia Standard) on underside of salver.  Leopard's head erased on underside of foot.  Fully marked (Britannia standard) on underside of foot of bowl.  Maker's mark, leopard's head erased, and figure of Britannia, on bezel of cover.
object_name: Covered bowl with salver, Covered two-handled bowl and small tazza, Two-handled covered bowl with footed salver
title: Covered bowl with salver
